data.title: A ‘leap second’ will be added to the end of 2016: Timekeepers announced Wednesday that on Dec. 31, at 11:59 p.m. and 59 seconds Universal Time (6:59 p.m. Eastern Time), the next second will become 11:59:60. The new year won’t start for another second.

Greyhound racing will be banned in New South Wales from July 1, 2017, with Premier Mike Baird saying "widespread and systemic mistreatment of animals" cannot be tolerated. Special commission of inquiry found overwhelming evidence of animal cruelty, including mass greyhound killings and live baiting.
Muslims face fines up to £8,000 for wearing burkas in Switzerland: The rule, which came into effect in Ticino on Friday, was voted in by referendum and outlaws face-covering headgear
The US has sanctioned North Korean leader Kim Jong-un for the first time, accusing him of human rights abuses.
Germany rape law: 'No means No' law passed
Medical marijuana use linked to lower prescription drug use
As Rio Readies For Summer Olympics, LGBT Brazilians Are Being Murdered On An Epic Scale
Global fish production is approaching its sustainable limit, with around 90% of the world’s stocks now fully or overfished, UN warns.
Hundreds of Venezuelan women storm border in search of food
Japan party backs use of medical marijuana, gets mixed reaction
